fields.name: FilePath
fields.description: A valid local path on the targeting VM. Must include the name of the capture file (*.cap). For linux virtual machine it must start with /var/captures. Required if no storage ID is provided, otherwise optional.

fields.name: StorageId
fields.description: The ID of the storage account to save the packet capture session. Required if no local file path is provided.

fields.name: StoragePath
fields.description: The URI of the storage path to save the packet capture. Must be a well-formed URI describing the location to save the packet capture.
